brand_identity.name: Build Launch
brand_identity.mission: The precision marketplace for renovation jobs in the GTA.

headings.usage: All section headers, hero titles, and major calls to action. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, inputs, and data tables.

mono.usage: License numbers, transaction IDs, code snippets, and technical data.

grid_system.marketing: Bento Grid (Asymmetric). Use grid-cols-12. Mix col-span-4, col-span-6, col-span-8.
grid_system.dashboard: Dense Grid. Sidebar fixed (w-64), Main content fluid. Cards use h-full.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(37,99,235,0.3)] transition-all duration-300

cards.style: bg-card text-card-foreground border border-border/40 shadow-sm hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/50 focus:border-primary transition-all

navigation.style: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-border/40 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-background/60

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on dark backgrounds to prevent banding and add tactility.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use colored shadows for primary actions (e.g., shadow-blue-500/20).

motion.marquee: Use react-fast-marquee for 'Trusted Contractors' and 'Recent Jobs' sections.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (default). For specialized construction icons, use Phosphor Icons if needed.

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode is the default and primary experience.
Use 'Space Grotesk' for all headings to give a technical, precise feel.
Avoid gradients on text unless it's a very subtle shine effect.
All cards must have a subtle border (border-white/10) to define edges in dark mode.
Use 'Manrope' for body text to ensure high legibility.
Interactive elements must have clear hover states (brightness-110 or subtle lift).
Forms must be clean, single-column where possible, with clear validation.
Escrow and Payment sections must look ultra-secure (use lock icons, shield motifs, green/gold accents for money).
Phone number 416-697-1728 must be visible in the Footer and Contact page.

setup: Install '@fontsource/space-grotesk' and '@fontsource/manrope' or add via Google Fonts.
Ensure Tailwind config extends the color palette with the specific hex codes provided.

pages.landing: Hero with Toronto skyline blended with construction blueprints. 'How it Works' section with 3-step Escrow flow. Marquee of 'Recent Jobs in Mississauga...'.
pages.auth: Split screen. Left side: High-quality renovation image. Right side: Clean form.
pages.dashboard_homeowner: Overview of 'My Projects'. Card for 'Active Escrow'. List of 'Incoming Bids'.
pages.dashboard_contractor: Map view or List view of 'Available Jobs'. 'My Earnings' chart. 'Verification Status' badge.
